about_the_game:
GRØWTH is a first-person psychological horror title that digs its roots deep into the player's psyche. Explore the town of Omlest, as you seek out the answers to the nightmare unfolding in front of you. But beware, you might not like what you uncover...



Exploration is Key

To learn about life in the town of Omlest, you must seek out the answers for yourselves. With a mixture of open-world exploration and a horror atmosphere, you'll navigate this ghastly town using your own intuitions. There are no waypoints.

Risk vs Reward

Never knowing what's around the corner, means exploring Omlest is always a gamble. There's also an emphasis on combat, and you'll have to weigh out whether you stick to your fight or flight response. Sometimes while exploring, you may find a ton of health and ammo, other times you might get ambushed. Whatever you do, keep your wits about you and keep going. Don't let the dread consume you.

Storytelling Through Interactivity

With a focus on telling the narrative through meaningful interactions, players are encouraged to engage with Omlest in creative ways. The town is full of puzzles, enemy variants, special items, unique art and lore. And every single building in the town is explorable!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features some grisly scenes and environments. A lot of the details are seen in the environment, and while the game focuses more on the disturbing aftermath left in areas, there is also some horror the player is subjected to.
